problem_text: Trapezoid M N P Q has an area of 360 square feet. Find the length of M N.
source: Textbook 2_Chapter 11 - Areas of Polygons and Circles.pdf
compact_text: Trapezoid MNPQ has an area of 360 square feet. Find the length of MN.
annotat_text: Trapezoid MNPQ has an area of 360 square feet. Find the length of $\overline{MN}$.
